reviews.sentence: Hotel deserves a 5 star rating. The Chatanogan Hotel deserves an 5 star rating. The facility was very clean the staff was very nice and helpful. Overall the indoor pool was GREAT. The room was very clean. Visited the Skyline Railroad Creative Discovery Museum for Kids and Hermans Soul Food Catering Restaurant.

Great experience. I had a great experience when I stayed there last week. Easy check in upgraded me to a king bed. Big immaculate room. Ordered room service for dinner and it arrived within 15 minutes. Decent exercise room and other amenities. I plan on many return trips to the Chatanogan.
Nice room lobby and restaurant. Paying an extra 8 to park.
I choose to stay at this hotel every time I visit Chattanooga because it has been consistent with it is amenities service and cleanlinesNothing.
The staff amenities and room were all spectacular. My wife and I plan on coming back for every visit we have to Chattanooga.
Views of Lookout Mountain. Convenient large hotel with nice amenities room service spa etc and large rooms. Very clean nice staff. The modern decor is a little tired but good facilities overall.
Had a wonderful trip great service food amenities. Would return.

The Chatanogan Hotel is a treat. The location could not be better with the current culinary development in Chattanooga. The rooms are comfortable in size and have just the right amount of amenities. In room coffee selection was great. The front desk staff was very accommodating and made sure I had everything I needed. I was able to work comfortably and efficiently. Definitely the best hotel in Chattanooga.
Nice atmosphere for a downtown hotel. Wonderful entrance with outdoor sitting areas including a fire pit and gas log fireplace. Easy access to downtown activities.

Wife and stayed here will seeing a concert next door and the staff and amenities were excellent. Parking was easy and the breakfast in the morning was delicious as well. The 4stars is for the pressure of the shower that was a mix between spa jets and an industrial pressure washer. Not a deal breaker but for Valentines Day wish the shower was more inviting.
The workers were attentive and efficient. Finding the entrance to the hotel was a bit challenging. The rooms were comfortable. A delightful experience overall.
Great but sorry. Facilities itself is very good but very sorry because when at the check of the breakfast other checks was put to our table with our check. This is an unbelievable thing.

Spacious room very clean nice appointments. COLD WATER. Had to take a cold shower. LOUD. Every sound in the hallway was magnified children crying adults laughing and talking could even hear conversations in rooms down the hall. Was excited about my first visit here but not a 4star experience.

do not go if you want to use the amenities. Very clean rooms nice comfy bed decent view brunch was awesome Over ran by kids playing on fitness equipment. large family over ran the entire indoor AND hot tub with kids2 of which had no swim diaper. It was 1030pm so you would think the hotel would have a curfew for kids so adults could enjoy the amenities in peace.

We had a great stay and would definitely stay there again. The hotel was beautiful. The staff was so nice and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay. Our TV was messing up and they came and reset it for us staff member was great. Our iron did not work and they brought us a brand new one. Our room was on the outside of the building so you could hear the traffic some but not too bad. You could also hear guests coming up and down the hall when they were talking but again not that bad.

Valentine Weekend. Good experience. We have stayed there before. We do n’t like having to pay 9 a day to self park. We had to make three trips back to lobby when checking in for key card would not work then were moved two floors up. It was cold in the lobby and they did n’t have fireplace on. The brunch in Broad Stre Grill was amazing. The indoor pool with view of mountains is spectacular as is the hot tub sauna and steam rooms. My husband got a massage in the spa that was excellent and the room was beautiful and spacious with great mattresses but no room service which was advertised.
The entrance is terribly small and the sign for it is too small I had hard time to find it. Very confusing entry. Driveway and sign for entrance to small missed it.

Good. Restaurants in building. Pool and spa on 2nd floor translates normally quiet end of hall room into loud entrance for half the hotel to access recreation. High end hotel price but plastic and paper cups in room.

The BarTender I believe her name is Katie working Dec 27th in the evening was very professional and a compliment to the hotel. The hotel is very nice and clean. If I had one issue it would be there is no sign at the front of the building stating the hotel driveway is behind the foundry restaurant. It ’s confusing to find the main entrance as google maps stops just outside the foundry restaurant.
Weekend Away. Property shows on one street but the entrance is on another. Floors and walls not a lot of privacy. Room was clean spacious. Had a nice weekend with my wife which was my main focus.
